name: Kevin Wright
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello, My Name is Kevin Wright. I'm a full time college student attending Los Angeles Southwest College; majoring in music. I believe what makes my resume stand out from the others will be my extensive background in customer service. I have about 7+ years in the field and i've operated numerous POS systems. I'm considered to be well organized, punctual, and professional. I'm also pretty chill!
experience:
Bulgogi Hut (Korean BBQ) Server/Host from 2015-2016
duties: serving, seating guest, keeping track of clientele 

Fresh Brothers (WeHo) cashier/server 2014-2017
duties: opening/closing store, operating POS, delivering orders
additionalInfo: I was gifted a Presidential award for Outstanding Volunteer Hours (745) by volunteering at the West LA Veteran's Hospital thorough-out my middle school years.
